title: 'Good for study and casual gaming can be done.'
body: 'Battery life is easily up to 8 to 9 hrs for just normal usage like reading from pdf and decrease on doing heavy tasks like playing high games. Build Quality is good ang sturdy. Looks premium Light weight . Value for money for me because I bought it for 36k in sale. No backlight keyboard Not for heavy gaming Not impressed with webcam quality No build in Alexa Overall I found it a good product'
